videos.title: Phillips - Carousel (2009)
videos.description: A chaotic sequence unfolds starting with a police officer on a parked car amidst explosions and a hospital firefight involving clowns. videos.alt_text: A$AP Rocky - Kids Turned Out Fine
videos.title: A$AP Rocky - Kids Turned Out Fine (2019)
videos.description: Directed by Dexter Navy, A$AP Rocky's "Kids Turned Out Fine" music video explores the transition from childhood to parenthood through surreal and dreamlike scenes, accompanied by a blissed-out vibe. Despite a dark twist related to the album title "TESTING," the video maintains a whimsical feel and highlights Rocky's psychedelic wardrobe.

videos.title: Botis Seva - Santo (2022)
videos.additional_info:
Botis Seva - Santo (2022)
Botis Seva, award-winning choreographer, explores the power of storytelling through images and motion.The film is a collaboration between Botis Seva and film director Freddie Leyden. The result, Santo, is an intimate expression of faith inspired by ancient Greek and Roman sculpture and religious scenes in medieval books of hours.
Technique - Bullet Time , Duplication , Magical realism
Director - Freddie Leyden
DOP - David Bird

videos.title: A$AP Ferg - Floor Seats (2019)
videos.description: In the music video for "Floor Seats," A$AP Ferg gives a supposedly VIP tour of New York City on his Redline BMX, showcasing the rare and unique experience of his life—complete with gravity-defying bike tricks and a closing act of a house party that makes Harlem look like the ultimate VIP lounge. Because nothing says VIP like riding a BMX through the streets and ending the night with a raucous house bash, right?
videos.additional_info:

videos.title: Rema - Trouble Maker (2023)
videos.description: The "Trouble Maker" music video by Rema, directed by Meji Alabi, features vibrant visuals and dynamic choreography that emphasize themes of triumph and resilience. Enhanced by Blaisebeatz's production, it provides a cinematic experience that complements the track's infectious beats. The video showcases Rema's unique style and artistic versatility.
videos.additional_info:
Rema - Trouble Maker (2023)
The "Trouble Maker" music video by Rema, directed by Meji Alabi, features vibrant visuals and dynamic choreography that emphasize themes of triumph and resilience. Enhanced by Blaisebeatz's production, it provides a cinematic experience that complements the track's infectious beats. The video showcases Rema's unique style and artistic versatility.

videos.alt_text: Duda Beat feat. Trevo - Nem Um Pouquinho
videos.title: Duda Beat feat. Trevo - Nem Um Pouquinho (2021)
videos.description: Duda Beat's single "Nem Um Pouquinho" featuring Trevo presents a cyberpunk and dystopian universe where she plays a metamorphic creature seeking revenge in a bitter heartbreak narrative. The video complements this theme with a fantastic approach, featuring urban arts, signage, and vehicles developed by the production design team, while the barbed rose symbolizes fatal charm throughout the project.
videos.additional_info:
Duda Beat feat. Trevo - Nem Um Pouquinho (2021)
Duda Beat's single "Nem Um Pouquinho" featuring Trevo presents a cyberpunk and dystopian universe where she plays a metamorphic creature seeking revenge in a bitter heartbreak narrative. The video complements this theme with a fantastic approach, featuring urban arts, signage, and vehicles developed by the production design team, while the barbed rose symbolizes fatal charm throughout the project.
Technique - Bullet Time , Spotlight , X-Axis Arc
Director - ALASKA
DOP - Fabio Politi

When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

videos.title: Nike - Never Settle. Never Done (2022)
videos.director: Alexandre Sellem, Hugo Beron, Lola Margrain
videos.additional_info:
Nike - Never Settle. Never Done (2022)
Valentin Petit, the visionary director of Nike's women's football campaign, skillfully captures the essence of the game by featuring a dynamic cast of all-stars and grassroots players in the Women's Euros anthem. His directorial prowess unveils the unparalleled speed, technical finesse, and undeniable quality that define the current landscape of women's football, setting a new standard for equality in the sport.
Technique - Arc , Bullet Time , Object Portal , X-Axis Arc
Director - Valentin Petit
DOP - Maeva Von Dinh, Paul Guilhaume
Editor - Alexandre Sellem, Hugo Beron, Lola Margrain
Colorist - Arthur Paux
